WorkItem.Description:
I am an Engineer and the program will not allow me to select Nitro Boosts as an enchant.  When I try to select this enchant i get the following message: 
Â 
System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection.
Parameter name: startIndex
   at System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(String source, String value, Int32 startIndex, Int32 count, CompareOptions options)
   at System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf(String source, String value, Int32 startIndex)

Comments.Message: I'm not able to reproduce this. Can you provide more information on what exactly you do to get this error. Also attach your character xml where this happens.

I'm not trying to do anything crazy.  I previously had Icewalker on my boots, but with some gear switching I had too much hit.  I have enchanted my boots now with Nitro Boots to drop the hit and pick up more crit and the run boost.  I click on the little enchant bar under the boots and when i place the mouse over the nitro Boots enchant I immediately get the pop up message with the error.  I have attached my xml file. 

I even tried reimporting my chr from the armory once the enchant was on there and it isnt applied in the numbers.
I'm still not able to reproduce this, but I identified some potential causes for this error. Check this again in next version and let us know if this was resolved for you.
